NomaiObject: Hearthians 1 OENO: The expedition has concluded.. We have found no signs of any survivors on the bramble's exterior. 2 1 PLUME: In that case, we should plan an expedition into the bramble's interior as soon as possible. That is the only path forward left. 3 2 OENO: No, Plume, we cannot attempt this risk. Our current methods of travel are far too incompatible for traversing the bramble's dangerous and winding interiors.. 4 3 OENO: Worse, countless hordes of anglerfish dwell in nearly every arm of the bramble. We were incredibly fortunate to have escaped the bramble at all. 5 4 PLUME: Perhaps.. If we could find their nest, we could cull some of the anglerfishes' numbers slowly with time.. 6 5 OENO: What? Plume, you.. you cannot mean that. 7 6 OENO: Putting aside the dangers of this plan, we cannot treat innocent lives with such wrath - even that of hostile creatures such as these. 8 7 OENO: The anglerfish bear no ill will against us. We should not seek vengeance against them for their instincts. 9 8 PLUME: But my brother could still be alive.. Our friends may be holding out hope for us inside - as long as the anglerfish stand in our way, our only choice will be to abandon them! 10 9 OENO: Plume, I understand your pain deeply.. But the odds are impossibly low for any of them to have survived for the length of time it took our clan to even reunite. 11 10 OENO: We cannot endanger more lives, including that of the native species.. We can only keep learning in their stead. 12 11 PLUME: We will find this Eye of the Universe. 13 12 PLUME: It was by sheer fortune that we should have survived in place of those who perished.. I believe we must devote ourselves to this mission they gave their lives for. 14 13 PLUME: Only then will we be able to honor their losses, and face the other clans again without shame. 15 14 CASSAVA: Plume, Oeno! I have found something! Please, come at once! 16 15 PLUME: C-Cassava. What is it? Have you.. found a survivor? 17 16 CASSAVA: I'm afraid not, Plume.. But please, follow me. I have constructed platforms on the side of this glacier that will lead us to this discovery! DBG EX0 11 DBG EX0.5 4 DBG EX1 17
